name: Haus Mühlfeld
description: Our house is only a 5 minute walk from Brandberg village centre, surrounded by the impressive Zillertaler mountains, fields and meadows. Quiet, yet centrally situated, our house is the ideal starting point for countless holiday activities. The nicely furnished holiday aparmtents are equipped with a stereo, Sat-TV and balcony. Pets are also very welcome. Relax in the sun on our sun terrace, and children can play in the sand pit or play area. We look forward to being able to welcome you to "Haus Mühlfeld". The Kogler Family.
The price is inclusive electricity . The final cleaning charge is between 30.- and 35.- Euro. Children's discounts on request.

Use the Inntal motorway until the exit for Zillertal, and from there 30km along the main Zillertal throughfare, the B169. Approx. 2km before Mayrhofen turn left, through the tunnel in the direction of Brandberg. Our house can be found in Brandberg, just after the old mill.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: The apartment is self contained and consists of one bedroom with 3 beds (a 4th is also a possibility) with shower, balcony, 1 double room with shower/WC, hall and kitchen/living room. Bed linen, hand towels, kitchen utensils, electricity, Sat-TV, additional double room with shower/WC and balcony also available.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 3 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: The holiday apartment is concluded and exists of 1 double room with shower and balcony, WC, kitchen-living room, SAT TV, way. Nevertheless, the flat can be extended by additional double rooms with shower and balcony (max. 8 people). Bedclothes, towels, dishes, electricity
